title: profitpal
author: profitpal
content: Hello AllI am a professional gambler who buys bet365 and 1xbet accounts weekly as they usually restrict accounts after winning 10-12k usd on thereI can't give any collateral But I can return 20% in 10 days or even lessWhen you can have enough trust then we can move to 5k/10k slowly once there is enough confidence and trust on the members on meI can even offer 20% monthly return on 10k investment But first lets start with slow and gain some trust of members of this site.How I do it-As said I am a professional gambler who buys 5-6 betting accounts as 1 account gets of no use as soon I make 10-15k profit thereSo lets start slow and go high

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: profitpal on March 07, 2023, 03:48:33 AMHello AllI am a professional gambler who buys bet365 and 1xbet accounts weekly as they usually restrict accounts after winning 10-12k usd on thereI can't give any collateral But I can return 20% in 10 days or even lessWhen you can have enough trust then we can move to 5k/10k slowly once there is enough confidence and trust on the members on meI can even offer 20% monthly return on 10k investment But first lets start with slow and gain some trust of members of this site.How I do it-As said I am a professional gambler who buys 5-6 betting accounts as 1 account gets of no use as soon I make 10-15k profit thereSo lets start slow and go highIf you are so successful and win so much that you are getting restricted frequently, why oh why do you need a loan? . You should swim in cash.Makes no sense -> no loan .PS: 1xbet is a total scam site , if you would actually win there they would never pay out, haha

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Hello chronic gambler.What collateral do you bring to the table?

comments.author: profitpal
comments.body: 1xbet and melbet becomes scam once you go beyond a limit of 5-6k in profitsThey are true cons no doubtsI bet using fiat only by buying neteller and skrill accounts tooI am planning to use cloudbet or stake this time so I need btc which I can return in 10 days with 20% interest Also anyone planning to do professional gambling then my advice is to stay away from 1xbet and partners

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: i have good account on pokerstars  good chest bonus every week i get bonusses    good deposit ratio also if you need docs to make those accounts  contact me

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: jerometash it's really funny how you keep accusing me for being a scammer when you have ZERO proof    nobody has ANY proof     so what are you really about ?  whats your deal here because i can't understand what your trying to do here if you don't give me a chance then explain me how i can proof to this forum i'm no scammer you guys don't give me any chance  ...  you can't accuse  me of being a scammer when you guys don't give me any loan   if you would give me loan and i don't repay  i accept offcourse you calling me a scammer however this is NOT the case!

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on March 11, 2023, 09:47:10 PMnobody has ANY proof     so what are you really about ?  whats your deal here because i can't understand what your trying to do hereIt's pretty self-explanatory, you are a newbie who has insisted on requesting for no collateral loans even when you have zero reputation (now it's negative) in the forum.You haven't died from the time your first no collateral loan was rejected, which means you don't actually need a loan, but you are just looking for someone to scam.What makes you keep coming back even when you know you won't get the loan?Quote from: ps34 on March 11, 2023, 09:47:10 PMif you don't give me a chance then explain me how i can proof to this forum i'm no scammer Because once you give a scammer a chance, you get scammed.
